sentences.en: A letter or symbol excluding digits, used in a language.
sentences.cn: 语言中使用的字母或其它符号,但不包括数字字符.

sentences.en: All bank's charges excluding interest are for applicant's account.
sentences.cn: 银行的费用包括利息费由开证申请人支付.

sentences.en: Excluding the 16 highest foreclosure states, the others almost flat prices.
sentences.cn: 将16个止赎现象最严重的州排除之后, 其它州的房价几乎持平.

sentences.en: Excluding water, half of the body's weight is protein.
sentences.cn: 除水而外, 人的一半体重是蛋白质.

sentences.en: Five persons spoke at the meeting excluding me.
sentences.cn: 除我以外,还有五个人在会上发了言.

sentences.en: Linsuanerqingjia, ammonium sulfate purification, packaging materials, chemical products ( excluding hazardous chemicals ) sales.
sentences.cn: 磷酸二氢钾 、 硫酸铵提纯, 包装材料 、 化工产品 ( 不含化学危险品 ) 销售.

sentences.en: Number of circulations excluding renewals. 7 th out of 10 libraries.
sentences.cn: 借阅数目(不包括续借). 在10间图书馆中排行第七.

sentences.en: Principal The amount borrowed from financial institutions, excluding interest and other charges.
sentences.cn: 本金这是同金融机构借贷, 不包括利率及其他收费在内的数额.

sentences.en: Television is watched in 97 per cent of American homes (excluding Alaska and Hawaii).
sentences.cn: 在美国，97%的家庭收看电视(不包括阿拉斯加和夏威夷)。

sentences.en: The families questioned, excluding those on income support, have a net income of £500.20 a week.
sentences.cn: 除那些依靠收入补助金的家庭外，被调查的家庭每周的净收入是500.20英镑。

sentences.en: The inflation rate excluding food prices was a less alarming 0.9 %.
sentences.cn: 除食品价格外,通货膨胀率为0.9%,该比率并不十分令人担忧.

sentences.en: The maximum weight allowance is 60 kilos per traveler, excluding hand lug.
sentences.cn: gage. 每个旅客托运的行李最大重量限额是60公斤, 手提行李除外.

sentences.en: The maximum weight allowance is 60 kilos per traveler, excluding hand luggage.
sentences.cn: 每个旅客托运的行李最大重量限额是60公斤, 手提行李除外.

sentences.en: The shop opens seven days a week excluding Christmas Day.
sentences.cn: 本商店每周七天营业,圣诞节除外.

sentences.en: There were 30 people in the hotel, excluding the hotel workers.
sentences.cn: 旅馆里有三十个人, 不包括旅馆工作人员.

sentences.en: Type the Product Key, excluding the dashes, in the boxes below.
sentences.cn: 在下面的框内键入产品密钥, 不包括“-”.

trans.tran_en: not including – used especially when you are making a list or calculating a total

trans.tran_cn: 排除，拒绝( exclude的现在分词)，驱逐
